parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Identity

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the pitch of a persons voice.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''pitch''' person

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[pitch]] [[player]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setPitch]]
</value></part></template></root>
